dcmURI.title: Exporter URI
dcmURI.description: RFC2079: Uniform Resource Identifier. Refer various Exporter URI that can be configured based on the exporter type.

dicomDescription.title: Exporter Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the exporter

dcmExportAsSourceAE.title: Export as Source Application Entity (AE)
dcmExportAsSourceAE.description: Mask the Archive Application Entity (AE) title by the title of the Application Entity (AE) from which a Series was received on establishing the Association to the Destination Application Entity (AE).

dcmDeleteStudyFromStorageID.title: Delete Study From Storage ID
dcmDeleteStudyFromStorageID.description: ID of Storage System from which the objects of the exported Study shall be deleted. Only effective for Export Tasks on Study level.

dcmRejectForDataRetentionExpiry.title: Reject Entity for Data Retention Expiry
dcmRejectForDataRetentionExpiry.description: Reject entity for Data Retention Expiry after export on completion of Export Task.

dcmStgCmtSCP.title: Storage Commitment SCP AE Title
dcmStgCmtSCP.description: AE Title of external Storage Commitment SCP used to verify export to another archive.

dcmIanDestination.title: Ian Destination
dcmIanDestination.description: Destination to send IAN N-CREATE RQ

dcmRetrieveAET.title: Retrieve AE Title
dcmRetrieveAET.description: AE Title associated with Network AE

dcmSchedule.title: Export Schedule
dcmSchedule.description: Delay export to specified time periods. If no Export Schedule is specified, queue the export task for processing immediately. Format: 'hour=[0-23] dayOfWeek=[0-6]' (0=Sunday)

dcmProperty.title: Exporter Property
dcmProperty.description: Specify exporter properties in format {name}={value}. Refer various Exporter Properties that can be configured based on the exporter type.
